sentence.Network_en: The Arkansan nodded understandingly and said, " Yep. I had a truck like that once.
sentence.Network_cn: ”那阿肯色人点了点头,满理解的样子,说, “ 是啊, 我有过一辆卡车也是那么大. ”

sentence.Network_en: Liu Yu - ying nodded and smiled understandingly.
He smiled understandingly -- much more than understandingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 他心领神会地一笑 —— 还不止心领神会.

PerfectNetExp.abs: understanding 谅解understandingly 领悟地understate 打着折扣说
understanding 颖悟的, understandingly 有理解力地, understandingly 宽容地
she explained the whole story and her boss nodded understandingly .她解释了事情的全部经过,她的上司理解地点着头.

auth_sentence.content: I nod understandingly at her tact, but think she means yes.

auth_sentence.content: She gasped understandingly again, and withdrew back into the darkness of her home.

auth_sentence.content: The man grumbled and gibbered, pointing toward the bar, and I nodded understandingly.
